og.description: Part One Not a transcript; just detailed notes.  Errors are mine. Relevant stocks: DJCO, BRK.A, PKX, DOW, TSLA, AMEX, COST, BYDDF,  KRFT Q: I came to be here from India. It is an honor to be here. What is your advice to a 20-year-old individual who wants to achieve financial freedom through investing? Mr. Munger: [...]
